continuity: Declarative: Sub + shall/will + (not) + be + V3 + O | Interrogative: Shall/will + Sub + (not) + be + V3 + O?

english: Will the report be written?
Tea will not be made.
Will the door be opened?
The student will be awarded.
Piyush will be honored.
Gifts will be distributed in the ceremony.
Will the class be taken?
Will the form be filled?
That task will not be done.
All students will be called.
The plan will not be implemented.
Sweets will be distributed.

hindi: क्या कार्य समय पर पूरा किया जाएगा?
english: Will the work be completed on time?
The letter will be sent today.
The doors will not be closed.
Will the exam be taken online?
Children will be rewarded.
Will the homework be checked?

hindi: रिपोर्ट समय पर नहीं भेजी जाएगी।
english: The report will not be sent on time.

hindi: क्या शिक्षक को आमंत्रित किया जाएगा?
english: Will the teacher be invited?
A new rule will be implemented.

hindi: क्या बच्चों को टॉफी दी जाएगी?
english: Will toffees be given to the children?
The class will be taught.
The board will not be cleaned.

hindi: पीयूष को टीम में शामिल किया जाएगा।
english: Piyush will be included in the team.

hindi: घर पूरी तरह से साफ किया जाएगा।
english: The house will be cleaned completely.
Will the prize be given?

hindi: वह गलती दोबारा नहीं दोहराई जाएगी।
english: That mistake will not be repeated again.
Will the ceremony be organized?
All doors will be closed.
Will your name be called?

hindi: किसी को दंड नहीं दिया जाएगा।
english: No one will be punished.

hindi: क्या शाम को भोजन परोसा जाएगा?
english: Will dinner be served in the evening?
Attendance will be taken.

hindi: यह कार्य कल तक किया जाएगा।
english: This task will be done by tomorrow.
Will the new form be filled?
Books will be given to the students.
Will the email be sent?

hindi: वह योजना सफल नहीं की जाएगी।
english: That plan will not be made successful.
Will the class be recorded?
The program will be conducted.
Will the speech be given?

hindi: सभा में सभी का स्वागत किया जाएगा।
english: Everyone will be welcomed in the assembly.

hindi: पुरस्कार विजेता को ही दिया जाएगा।
english: The prize will be given only to the winner.
Will the house be decorated?

hindi: क्या नाम लिस्ट में जोड़ा जाएगा?
english: Will the name be added to the list?

hindi: नया रूल अगले सप्ताह से लागू किया जाएगा।
english: The new rule will be implemented from next week.
Piyush will be given a promotion.

hindi: क्या कक्षा समय पर शुरू की जाएगी?
english: Will the class be started on time?

hindi: कार्य सोमवार को पूरा किया जाएगा।
english: The work will be completed on Monday.
